name: Fractal Encryption
description:
This mysterious symbol-covered object contains valuable loot. It will require a Fractal Encryption Key to open.

Fractal Encryption Keys can be purchased inside Dessa's lab in the Mistlock Observatory.

name: Butternut Squash Seeds
description: Plant these seeds in your hidden garden in Mount Maelstrom.

description: Purchase this recipe from Miyani.

name: Ascalonian Fractal Field Research Paper
description: Complete daily recommended fractals to obtain fractal research pages. Combine the pages into a completed journal and exchange it for an Ascalonian Fractal Research Paper from the Ascalonian Fractal Field Researcher located at the end of the Urban Battlegrounds fractal.

name: Aetherblade Handbook
description:
Purchased from the Aetherblade Quartermaster in the Captain Mai Trin Boss fractal for Balls of Dark Energy. Dark Energy can be gained from salvaging ascended items using an Ascended Salvage Kit.

name: Indigo Mushroom

Ingredient
A rare mushroom found in mushroom patches.
Double-click to squeeze 25 mushrooms for their milk.
<c=@flavor>Fabled mushrooms of vibrant hue.<c>

description:

Contains loot from creatures.
<c=@reminder>Affected by magic-find bonuses.</c>
